name.baseName: a local branded pure milk productions ; Packaging disposal
本地品牌纯牛奶生产 ; 包装处理

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Recycling is selected for the packaging waste pre-treatment. Because of the separation technique for aluminum-plastic composites usually with a lower heating value, these containers are not suitable for incineration
包装废弃物预处理选择回收利用。由于铝塑复合材料的分离技术通常具有较低的热值，因此这些容器不适合焚烧

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The Tetra Pak 1litre pure liquid milk is selected to assess its lifecycle based carbon footprint.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The milk source base is located at Hongya Country, Southwestern Sichuan Province, China, about 147 kilometres far from Chengdu City, the provincial capital. The diary processing plant is located at Pixian, suburb of Chengdu City, which is about 175 kilometres far from the milk source base. The branded milk is mainly distributed to the central Chengdu City, about 40 kilometres distances from the diary processing plant. The milk packaging waste is transported to the municipal landfill for final disposal, about 30 kilometres away from the central city.
奶源基地位于中国四川省西南部洪崖县，距离省会成都市约147公里。乳品加工厂位于成都郊区郫县，距离奶源基地约175公里。品牌牛奶主要分布在距离乳制品加工厂约40公里的成都市中心。牛奶包装废弃物被运送到距离市中心约30公里的市政垃圾填埋场进行最终处理。

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: This study only focused on processes that directly contributed to pure milk production, that is, only the effects of energy and material input and carbon emissions, as shown in Figure 1. The system boundary of milk life cycle is thus simplified and divided into four stages, namely, raw milk production, dairy product processing, product transportation and packaging waste disposal.
本研究仅关注对纯牛奶生产有直接贡献的过程，即仅关注能源和材料投入以及碳排放的影响，如图1所示。从而简化了牛奶生命周期的系统边界，将其划分为原料奶生产、乳制品加工、产品运输和包装废弃物处理四个阶段。
technology.technologicalApplicability: This local branded pure milk production and packaging disposal process is designed for the generation of dairy products, specifically pure liquid milk distributed primarily within the Chengdu city center. The process includes the life cycle stages of raw milk production, dairy product processing, product transportation, and packaging waste disposal, with an emphasis on sustainability and minimizing the carbon footprint associated with each stage. The packaging materials are composed of aluminum-plastic composites, which are not designed for incineration due to low heating value and are instead directed towards recycling and final disposal in landfills.
本地牌纯牛奶生产和包装废弃物处理过程主要用于生产乳制品，特别是主要分布在成都市中心的纯液体牛奶。该过程包括原料奶生产、乳品加工、产品运输和包装废弃物处理等生命周期阶段，重点在于可持续性并最小化与每个阶段相关的碳足迹。包装材料由铝塑复合材料构成，由于热值低，这些材料不适合焚烧，而是选择回收和最终在垃圾填埋场处置。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Compared with the conventional LCA, the process of life cycle impact assessment is simplified in this study, as it mainly uses different categories of indicators to elaborate results of life cycle inventory (Nigri et al., 2014).
与传统的LCA相比，本研究简化了生命周期影响评估的过程，主要使用不同类别的指标来阐述生命周期清单的结果(Nigri et al.， 2014)。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Recycling is selected for the packaging waste pre-treatment. Because of the separation technique for aluminum-plastic composites usually with a lower heating value, these containers are not suitable for incineration (Xie et al., 2011). Therefore, landfill disposal is the ultimate choice (Meneses et al., 2012). Data on the carbon emissions during the landfill stage are by analogy to Cherubini’s inventory of sanitary landfill disposal (Cherubini et al., 2009), shown in Table 4.
包装废弃物预处理选择回收利用。由于铝塑复合材料的分离技术通常具有较低的热值，这些容器不适合焚烧(Xie et al.， 2011)。因此，填埋处理是最终的选择(Meneses et al.， 2012)。填埋阶段的碳排放数据类似于Cherubini的卫生填埋处置清单(Cherubini et al.， 2009)，见表4。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Zhao, R., Xu, Y., Wen, X., Zhang, N. & Cai, J. Carbon footprint assessment for a local branded pure milk product: a lifecycle based approach. Food Sci. Technol 38, 98–105 (2017).
Zhao, R., Xu, Y., Wen, X., Zhang, N. & Cai, J. Carbon footprint assessment for a local branded pure milk product: a lifecycle based approach. Food Sci. Technol 38, 98–105 (2017).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this LCA data should focus only on the processes that directly contribute to pure milk production, specifically considering the inputs of energy and materials as well as the associated carbon emissions. Allocated system boundaries simplify the life cycle into raw milk production, dairy product processing, product transportation, and packaging waste disposal. Users must employ recycling for pre-treatment of packaging waste, refrain from incineration due to low heating values of aluminum-plastic composites, and consider landfill disposal as the final step, referencing carbon emission data from established inventories such as Cherubini et al. (2009). Methodologically, this study simplifies the life cycle impact assessment process and should be factored in when interpreting LCA results.

LCA数据用户应仅关注直接贡献于纯牛奶生产的过程，具体考虑能源和材料投入以及相关的碳排放。分配的系统边界简化了生命周期为原料奶生产、乳制品加工、产品运输和包装废弃物处理。用户必须在包装废物预处理时进行回收，由于铝塑复合材料热值低，避免焚烧，并考虑填埋处置作为最后步骤，参考诸如Cherubini等人（2009年）建立的碳排放数据清单。在方法论上，本研究简化了生命周期影响评估过程，在解释LCA结果时应予以考虑。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
